FOUND IN: Colchicum autumnale (commonly known as Autumn Crocus, has bulbous structures related to the function of corms)
Somnolent state (the condition of being drowsy or on the brink of falling asleep, which might precede entering the Land of Nod)

CLUE: Such as is found in the Greek dish keftedes
FOUND IN: Rolled (as in rolled meatballs, keftedes is a Greek term for meatballs)
